name: BeaconBlockchainSubstrate
summary: Beacon is an implementation of the wallet interaction standard tzip-10 which describes the connection of a dApp with a wallet. BeaconBlockchainSubstrate provides a set of messages, utility functions and other components specific for Substrate blockchains.
description: Beacon is an implementation of the Tezos wallet interaction standard tzip-10 which describes the connection of a dApp with a wallet. BeaconBlockchainSubstrate provides a set of messages, utility functions and other components specific for Substrate blockchains.
